attributes.action: Stop migrants crossing the Channel and using taxpayers money to house them
attributes.additional_details: We want parliament to do this as its a waste of tax payers money, these are illegal migrants entering our country, we didnt vote for brexit to control our border just so people could float in on a dinghy
attributes.background: Stop migrants crossing the Channel and using taxpayers money to house them they aren't refugees, they aren't fleeing france its an absolute nightmare and we the people are paying for them have our Royal Navy deployed to stop this mess

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the below petition we have open on this topic:

Take action to prevent illegal attempts to enter the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579552
